task.title: Create Your First Task
task.shortdesc: Learn the steps to add a new task and set a basic reminder in Noter.app.

context.p: Follow these steps to create a new to-do item. You will also learn how to set a simple reminder for it in Noter.app.

substep.cmd: Find the "Tasks" section in the Sidebar.
substep.info: Click on "Tasks". This opens the task management area. It appears in the main Note Editor Pane.

substep.cmd: Look for the "Add Task" button. It is a "+" icon, placed at the top of the task list. (See the Interface Overview)
substep.info: Click "Add Task" or the "+" icon. A new, empty task field will show. A cursor will blink, ready for your task description.

substep.cmd: Type what you need to do in the new task field.
Find the "Reminder" icon. It looks like a bell icon, placed near your new task. Click on it.
substep.info: A simple reminder window will appear. Choose a date and time. Click "Save" to confirm.

taskbody.result: Your first task is now created. If you set one, a basic reminder is also active. The task is in your task list. You will get a notification at the set time.
